page.title: 07The Family 2.
page.content: In most families in the area the lady of the family usually does all the cooking and preparation of food for the rest of the family. This is done in the kitchen of the house and there are usually three meals a day to be prepared. The first meal of the day is breakfast which usually consists of a cereal and toast with either tea or coffee to drink.Sometimes the meal is a "traditional English breakfast" which consists of bacon and eggs which have been fried. The family is not always together for the lunchtime meal as the children are at school and the man of the house is usually at work and lunch is eaten at these places.The family gets together again in the evening and the lady of the house prepares an evening meal but this is not always eaten as a family.
